name: ENVITED-X Data Space: Asset Registration
description:
ENVITED-X Data Space

A FA2.1 compliant contract to mint standardized assets in the GaiaX compliant data space with access restriction through the Decentralized Member Identity Management at the Automotive Solution Center for Simulation e.V.
